info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 12:42AM CDT until June 02 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CALLAHAN AND SOUTHEASTERN SHACKELFORD COUNTIES... At 1242 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ibex, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Moran around 1255 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mccarty Lake, Us-180 Near The Shackelford-Stephens County Line and Us- 283 Near The Callahan-Shackelford County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is an EXTREMELY DANGEROUS SITUATION with tornado like wind speeds expected. Mobile homes and high profile vehicles are especially susceptible to winds of this magnitude and may be overturned. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm has the potential to cause serious injury and significant property damage.
